name: French Toast
description: Golden-brown French toast served with powdered sugar and maple syrup.

name: Bagel with Cream Cheese
description: Toasted bagel served with a generous spread of cream cheese.

name: Avocado Toast
description: Whole grain toast topped with mashed avocado, cherry tomatoes, and a sprinkle of sea salt.

name: Eggs Benedict
description: Poached eggs with Canadian bacon on English muffins, topped with hollandaise sauce.

name: Breakfast Burrito
description: A large tortilla filled with scrambled eggs, cheese, sausage, and salsa.

name: Greek Salad
description: Fresh salad with cucumbers, tomatoes, olives, feta cheese, and a light vinaigrette.

name: Chicken Caesar Wrap
description: Grilled chicken, romaine lettuce, Parmesan, and Caesar dressing in a whole wheat wrap.

name: Quinoa Bowl
description: Healthy bowl with quinoa, black beans, corn, avocado, and a lime vinaigrette.

name: BLT Sandwich
description: Classic bacon, lettuce, and tomato sandwich with mayo on toasted bread.

name: Veggie Burger
description: Delicious veggie patty with lettuce, tomato, and avocado on a whole wheat bun.

name: Chicken Alfredo
description: Creamy Alfredo pasta with grilled chicken breast and Parmesan cheese.

name: Beef Stroganoff
description: Tender beef in a rich mushroom and sour cream sauce, served over egg noodles.

name: Shrimp Scampi
description: Sautéed shrimp in a garlic butter sauce, served over linguine.

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
description: Mixed vegetables stir-fried with a savory soy-ginger sauce, served with rice.

name: Beef Tacos
description: Three soft tacos filled with seasoned beef, lettuce, cheese, and salsa.

name: Mashed Potatoes
description: Creamy mashed potatoes with butter and garlic.

name: Coleslaw
description: Classic coleslaw with a tangy dressing.

name: Mac and Cheese
description: Creamy macaroni and cheese with a breadcrumb topping.

name: Garlic Bread
description: Toasted bread with garlic butter and herbs.

name: Onion Rings
description: Crispy fried onion rings served with a side of ranch.

name: Apple Pie
description: Classic apple pie with a flaky crust.

name: Brownie
description: Rich and fudgy chocolate brownie.

name: Fruit Tart
description: Delicious tart filled with custard and topped with fresh fruit.

name: Pudding
description: Creamy chocolate or vanilla pudding.

name: Lemon Bar
description: Tangy and sweet lemon bar with a shortbread crust.

name: Latte
description: Espresso with steamed milk and a light layer of foam.

name: Smoothie
description: Blended fruit smoothie with your choice of flavors.

name: Hot Chocolate
description: Rich and creamy hot chocolate topped with whipped cream.

name: Milkshake
description: Thick and creamy milkshake in your choice of chocolate, vanilla, or strawberry.

name: Lemonade
description: Refreshing homemade lemonade.

name: Buffalo Wings
description: Spicy chicken wings served with celery sticks and ranch or blue cheese dressing.

name: Spring Rolls
description: Crispy rolls filled with vegetables and served with a sweet and spicy dipping sauce.

name: Nachos
description: Tortilla chips topped with melted cheese, jalapeños, and your choice of toppings.

name: Hummus Platter
description: A platter of creamy hummus served with pita bread, olives, and fresh veggies.

name: Mozzarella Sticks
description: Breaded and fried mozzarella cheese sticks served with marinara sauce.

name: Cheese Plate
description: An assortment of cheeses served with crackers and fresh fruit.

name: Pita Bread with Tzatziki
description: Warm pita bread served with a side of cool and creamy tzatziki sauce.

name: Stuffed Mushrooms
description: Mushrooms stuffed with a blend of cheeses and herbs, baked until golden.

name: Bruschetta
description: Toasted bread slices topped with a mixture of tomatoes, basil, and garlic.

name: Deviled Eggs
description: Hard-boiled eggs filled with a creamy yolk mixture and sprinkled with paprika.
